response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $11,000. This is a special opportunity tailored specifically for you, aiming to provide you with the best possible deal while ensuring a fair return for us. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations and if you wish to proceed with the purchase. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 11000}
